results.text: God said to Moses, 'I am who I am. This is what you are to say to the Israelites: I am has sent me to you.'
results.reason: This verse reveals God's self-existence and eternal nature, emphasizing that He is beyond human comprehension.
results.reflection: God's identity is rooted in His eternal and unchanging nature.

results.text: Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.
results.reason: This verse identifies God as the essence of love, highlighting His inherent nature of compassion and kindness.
results.reflection: Understanding God begins with recognizing His love.

results.text: I am the Alpha and the Omega, the First and the Last, the Beginning and the End.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes God's eternal presence and sovereignty over all of creation.
results.reflection: God encompasses all time and existence, affirming His ultimate authority.

results.text: 'Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.'
results.reason: This verse invites believers to recognize God's supremacy and to find peace in His power.
results.reflection: In quietness and trust, we come to know God's true essence.

results.text: The Son is the radiance of God's glory and the exact representation of his being, sustaining all things by his powerful word.
results.reason: This verse illustrates how Jesus embodies the nature and character of God, making Him known to humanity.
results.reflection: In Christ, we see the fullness of God's nature displayed.
